changes_summary.step_25: Created SessionManager with HashMap-based request tracking, connection state, idle timeout, 7 unit tests
changes_summary.step_26: Added clap Args struct with --port/--heartbeat-interval/--idle-timeout, HEARTBEAT_INTERVAL and IDLE_TIMEOUT OnceLocks, DEFAULT_PORT changed to 9100, cxxqt_bridge reads HEARTBEAT_INTERVAL from OnceLock
changes_summary.step_27: Verified existing release profile, DPI manifest, winresource conditional compilation. Release build confirmed working.
changes_summary.step_28: Created comprehensive README.md with architecture diagram, CLI reference, protocol spec, troubleshooting
